concept.title: 219.706 Responsibilities of the cognizant administrative contracting officer.

conbody.p: (a)(i) The contract administration office also is responsible for reviewing, evaluating, and approving master subcontracting plans.
(ii) The small business specialist supports the administrative contracting officer in evaluating a contractor's performance and compliance with its subcontracting plan.
